ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:0.5_0: The second training rule on exchanging what belongs to a group
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.2_0: On one occasion a certain association had been designated from precincts to precincts. The nuns who were felt rice porridge were having a meal.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.3_0: After collecting rice porridge and honey balls to the nuns, he went to the house of that householder and said,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.4_0: “Venerables, rice porridge ingredients are stored in such-and-such a shop.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.5_0: Please have someone get rice from that, have rice porridge cooked, and then eat it.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.6_0: But even though they had asked for them, the nuns exchanged those requisites for tonics, which they then used.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.7_0: He then complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.8_0: “When collective ingredients are designated for a specific purpose and were asked for, how could the nuns exchange them for something else?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.9_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.12_0: “... When collective ingredients are designated for a specific purpose and were asked for, how could the nuns exchange them for something else?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.13_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.14_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.15.1_0: ‘When a collective requisite is designated for a specific purpose and was asked for, if a nun exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.5_0: When requisites are designated for a specific purpose,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.6_0: against the benefit of someone else.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.8_0: as a group, not a single monk, nor is there for the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.12_0: if, apart from the purpose for which it was given, she exchanges it for something else, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.13_0: When he gets the sitting-blanket, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.14_0: It should be relinquished to a sangha, a group, or an individual.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.15_0: “And, monks, it should be relinquished like this. ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.17_0: ‘Venerables, this thing, which I got in exchange for a collective requisite that was designated for a specific purpose and had been asked for, is to be relinquished.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.18_0: I relinquish them to the Sangha.’ ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.20_0: Suppose that they were to give?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.21_0: Please give her back to you.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.22.1_0: If it is for a specific purpose, and she perceives it as such, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.23_0: If it is for a specific purpose, but she is unsure of it, and she exchange it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.24_0: If it is for a specific purpose, but she does not perceive it as such, and she gets that in exchange, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.25_0: But he obtains them, then to be given by.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.26_0: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she perceives that it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.27_0: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.28_0: If it is not for a specific purpose, and she does not perceive that it is, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.31_0: if she gets permission from the owners;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.32_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.34_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.35_0: The ninth rule, the training rule on nine, is finished.
